usage: Describe usage of Free games bot
- `fetch` : fetch and display free games, main command of this bot
- `schedule` : schedule free games notifications on this channel
- `next` : Tell the next time this channel will receive notifications
- `cancel` : cancel scheduled notifications on this channel
- `help` : Show help about a specific command. Example : `/games help next`
- `sources` : Show a list of compatible sources to use with fetch command like `/games fetch source1 source2`
- `usage` : Show this list of usable commands
If neither command nor sources are provided, will show free games list. To know more : `/games help`
fetch: List free games among various websites
Where sources is optionnal or is a list of known sources. Sources can be listed with `/games sources`
help: Where command is a command name known by the bot.
schedule: Schedule periodic notifications on this channel
Where expr is an optionnal cron expression. Examples
- Schedule notifications every Thursday, at 9am (default): `/games schedule 0 9 * * THU`
next: Show if and when will occur the next periodic notifications
cancel: Cancel any periodic notifications on this channel
sources: Show a list of compatible sources
about: Show bot's currently running version and timezone
